name: GeoDataSource Country Region DropDown
author: GeoDataSource

sections.description:
GeoDataSource Country Region DropDown plugin use the shortcode to display the country and region in dropdown. A dropdown menu created with javascript that allows user to implement country-region dropdown list effortlessly. Country-Region Dropdown Menu is needed mostly in forms where the built-in region field will be shown in the dropdown automatically when there is a change on the country field.

It can be applied as easy as by entering the given required shortcode into the post, article, page or Contact Form. For example,[gds-country-dropdown]

More Information

Please visit us at https://www.geodatasource.com
sections.installation:
Manual Installation (Use this method only if you are unable to install the plugin via the admin area)

  1. Download the plugin zip file.
  2. Unzip and upload the geodatasource-country-region-dropdown folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. You can now start using GeoDataSource Country Region DropDown with the shortcodes provided.
sections.changelog:
• 1.0.1 Minor changes on file structure.
  • 1.0.0 First public release.
